titles: A proclamation for choosing the additional representatives of barons to the Parliament
author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Scotland. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)
publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, Printer to their most excellent Majesties,
notes: Dated at end: Given under Our Signet at Edinburgh, the fourth day of August, 1690. And of Our Reign the second year.
Signed: Gilb. Eliot Cls. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
keywords: Scotland. --  Parliament --  Elections --  Early works to 1800.
